item.title: Understanding Roulette Systems
item.description: It's an interesting fact that Roulette is one of the oldest casino games still played today. First played in 17th century France, the game has undergone many changes over time, remaining fresh, interesting and different from most other casino games.
item.itunes:author: www.gamblux.com
